messages.subject: Support a Grown Unschooler!
messages.msgSnippet: My son Julian Baptista, a grown unschooler, is about to release his first album! You may have seen him play guitar and sing at Live and Learn conferences  and
messages.messageBody:
My son Julian Baptista, a grown unschooler, is about to release his first
album! You may have seen him play guitar and sing at Live and Learn
conferences and Northeast Unschooling Conferences.

You can hear some of his music at his Myspace:
_http://www.myspace.com/julianbaptista_ (http://www.myspace.com/julianbaptista) , Then please go and
visit his web site _www.JulianBaptista.com_ (http://www.JulianBaptista.com)
and order "Lost in the Crowd." Free shipping on pre-sales, and the album
will ship in January. You could also become his fan on Facebook.

Also, for those in the Greater Boston area, he will be performing in
January in his first professional (PAID!!!) featured gig! We'll have details
soon.

Kathryn Baptista, very excited mama


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
